attributes.action: Stop housing illegal imagrants in hotels before our own homeless.
attributes.additional_details: I would really like this looking in to/bringing up.as we do not know who these people are.intigrating with our own people and children..I've heard alot of bad things about rapes and crimes...also the money and free stuff we give to these people make it a haven for them...stop all the perks and they will stop coming to our shores
attributes.background: We would like something to be done about all our holiday places that are being renovated to house imagrants. Abolished...we where paying to stay in these dirty places not so long ago.but now they are getting fitted out for imigrants..our homeless are still out on the streets.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop housing asylum seekers who entered the UK illegally in hotels: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628324

Increase support for homeless people: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631032
